channel.title: Guide on how to mod/admin a player
channel.description:
ok ive seen many people post this so i thought i say how to do it....
1. go to the "characters" file and find the person your want to admin or mod. 2.then in their profile look for "character rights = 0". 3.change the 0 to either 1, 2 or 3 (1 = mod, 2 = admin, 3 = owner) 4.save then compile then run and enjoy ;D
*i think that "character rights = -1 is banned...not sure*[br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2007, 12:25:39 PM[/size][hr]i was gunna mention 4 but it dont apply to all servers i dont think, well thats what i was told...and i said i wasnt sure about -1

item.title: Guide on how to mod/admin a player
item.dc:creator: @chris13 chris13
item.description:
@chris13 wrote:

ok ive seen many people post this so i thought i say how to do it…

  1. go to the “characters” file and find the person your want to admin or mod.
    2.then in their profile look for “character rights = 0”.
    3.change the 0 to either 1, 2 or 3 (1 = mod, 2 = admin, 3 = owner)
    4.save then compile then run and enjoy ;D

i think that "character rights = -1 is banned…not sure[br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2007, 12:25:39 PM[/size][hr]i was gunna mention 4 but it dont apply to all servers i dont think, well thats what i was told…and i said i wasnt sure about -1
